fields.name: Copy_1_of_The_caregiver_does_not_intervene_despite_knowledge_or_reasonable_expec
fields.fieldText: The caregiver does not intervene despite knowledge (or reasonable expectation that the caregiver should have knowledge) that the child is being harmed (includes physical or sexual abuse, neglect or mental injury) by another person

fields.name: Copy_1_of_A_child_of_any_age_has_been_abandoned
fields.fieldText: A child of any age has been abandoned

fields.name: Copy_1_of_A_child_of_any_age_who_is_physically_intellectually_or_cognitively_dis
fields.fieldText: A child of any age who is physically,intellectually,or cognitively disabled is left unsupervised or with responsibilities beyond his or her capabilities

fields.name: Copy_1_of_A_child_over_the_age_of_8_has_been_left_alone_without_support_systems
fields.fieldText: A child over the age of 8 has been left alone without support systems for long periods of time or with responsibilities beyond his or her capabilities

fields.fieldText: A child under the age of 8 has been left alone or in the care of an inappropriate caregiver

fields.name: Copy_1_of_The_unreasonable_delay_refusal_or_failure_on_the_part_of_the_caregiver
fields.fieldText: The unreasonable delay, refusal, or failure on the part of the caregiver to seek , obtain, and/or maintain necessary medical, dental, or mental health care

fields.name: Copy_1_of_A_child_has_an_observable_identifiable_and_substantial_impairment_of_h
fields.fieldText: A child has an observable ,identifiable, and substantial impairment of his/her mental or psychological ability to function as a result of an act of a parent, permanent or temporary caregiver, or household or family member

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Neglect_child_has_an_observable_identif
fields.fieldText: A child has an observable, identifiable, and substantial impairment of his/her mental or psychological ability to function as a result of an act of a parent, permanent or temporary caregiver, or household or family member
